name: Department of Defense obligations for research, development, test, and evaluation, by state or location, agency, and performer: FY 2021
description: Department of Defense obligations for research, development, test, and evaluation, by state or location, agency, and performer: FY 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_state_or_location_and_agency_b
variableMeasured.description: State or location and agency hierarchy

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Because of rounding, detail may not add to total. As of volume 71 (FYs 2021–22), FFRDCs are classified as intramural R&D performers, whereas they were extramural in previous volumes; therefore, data are not directly comparable across volumes. Past years in the trend tables have been adjusted to reflect the current classification of FFRDCs. Geographic distribution of DOD development funding to businesses reflects location of prime contractors and not the numerous subcontractors who perform much of the R&D. FY 2021 obligations include additional funding provided by supplemental COVID-19 pandemic-related appropriations (e.g., Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security [CARES] Act). See technical table A-2 for additional notes associated with the agencies listed in this table.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development, FYs 2021–22.
